plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me

plant.question: I am pretty and colorful. Bees like to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am big and tall, with leaves and branches. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I give you shade on a sunny day.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.
🪵 I can be made into furniture.

plant.question: I am long and thin and grow on a plant. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow when I am ripe.

plant.question: I am small and round and grow on a bush. I am red and sweet. What am I?
I have prickly needles and stay green all year. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 I'm often decorated during the holidays
🏔️ You can find me in the mountains

plant.question: I have a big stem, and you can eat me when I pop! What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 Some people eat me on the cob!
🍿 I can be made into a tasty snack

plant.question: I grow underground and have lots of eyes. You can make yummy fries out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 People like to make fries out of me!

plant.question: I'm a big, round fruit with a green outside and red inside, full of black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 I'm perfect for a hot summer day
⚫ I have lots of small black seeds

plant.question: I'm a vegetable that looks like a little tree. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 You can eat me with dip.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, with lots of water. What am I?
I am a fish with bright colors! Nemo is one of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🟠 I have orange and white stripes!

ocean.question: I have a shell and I live in the ocean. I move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I crawl on the ocean floor!
🥬 I like to eat sea plants!

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I have suckers on my arms!

ocean.question: I am very big and swim in the ocean. I sing a song. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I blow water out of my head!

ocean.question: I walk sideways on the beach, what am I?

hints.text: 🏖️ I dig holes in the sand!

ocean.question: I am long and green and grow in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 Fish like to hide in me!
🌊 I sway back and forth in the water!

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and can hide my head and legs inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay eggs in the sand!
Slow and steady wins the race

ocean.question: I’m a very big fish that can be scary and has many sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I have a fin on my back!

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and jump out of the water. I am friendly and smart! What am I?
